comments:
Hi,

I got the following exception ven try to link an output folder to some other folder in the file system, not from project folder. I use a path variable and "Extend..." button from 'Select Path Variable' dialog to select the output folder for a project. I use the same workspace with older versions 3.1, 3.1.1 and 3.1.2. Also I tried to Delete and recreate the project and I stil get this exception.

Best regards,


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.ide 4 4 2006-07-21 21:15:10.343
!MESSAGE Exception in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.buildpaths.FolderSelectionDialog$2.createNewFolder: java.lang.NullPointerException

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.ide 4 4 2006-07-21 21:15:10.343
!MESSAGE Exception in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.wizards.buildpaths.FolderSelectionDialog$2.createNewFolder: java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.locationURIFor(FileSystemResourceManager.java:557)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getLocationURI(Resource.java:950)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.LocationValidator.validateLinkLocationURI(LocationValidator.java:161)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.validateLinkLocationURI(Workspace.java:1971)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.assertLinkRequirements(Resource.java:150)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.createLink(Resource.java:588)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.createLink(Resource.java:570)
	at org.eclipse.ui.dialogs.NewFolderDialog$5.execute(NewFolderDialog.java:276)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

What build of Eclipse are you using? (see Help > About)

Can you reproduce the problem in a new workspace?

Eclipse version:
Version: 3.2.0
Build id: M20060629-1905

I wasn't able to reproduce it with new workspace. I used this workspace before with older versions of Ecplipse starting with 3.0.

best regards,
piri
*** Bug 153757 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Actually, this is really a dup of bug 144499.  I have added some protection to the code that makes it impossible to get null value here, but I'm still keeping this open because I can't figure out how it happened and there may be other side-effects in that situation I have missed.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 144499 ***
